Package edu.baylor.flarn.services

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.baylor.flarn.services.UserService
  • @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    User service provides CRUD operations on the User model. However, it doesn't allow the delete operation, instead it disables the user account.
